thread.title: Bill Maher Hopes The Patriots Lose The Super Bowl, Because Of Donald Trump
thread.title_full: Bill Maher Hopes The Patriots Lose The Super Bowl, Because Of Donald Trump

author: Lee Moran
title: Bill Maher Hopes The Patriots Lose The Super Bowl, Because Of Donald Trump
text:
Bill Maher Hopes The Patriots Lose The Super Bowl, Because Of Donald Trump "Go Falcons!" Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Bill Maher is rooting for the Atlanta Falcons at the Super Bowl on Sunday. Not because he’s from Atlanta or is a longtime fan of the team, but because of who they are facing ― the New England Patriots . “ The Falcons are playing a team where the owner, the coach and the star quarterback all love and support Donald Trump ,” Maher said on Friday’s broadcast of “ Real Time . “So I’d really like for them (The Patriots) to lose by a score of a million fucking thousand to none.” Maher, a fierce critic of Trump, later lamented how the new POTUS was politicizing things that just shouldn’t even be political ― including football. 
Check out the full segment above. Related Coverage
